info.title: ITA Taxonomies
info.description: The ITA Taxonomies API gives developers direct access to the exporting, trade, and investment terms that ITA uses to tag the content and data in its other APIs.

get.description: The ITA Taxonomies API gives developers direct access to the exporting, trade, and investment terms that ITA uses to tag the content and data in its other APIs.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Returns taxonomy terms for a match within label field.

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: Returns terms that fall under the given high-level taxonomy types. Enter multiple values separated by commas. The possible values are Industries, Topics, Countries, Trade Regions, and World Regions.

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: Returns terms based on exact matching of the label field. Enter multiple values separated by commas.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size parameter allows you to configure the number of results to be returned up to a maximum of 100.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset parameter defines the offset from the first result you want to fetch. Unless specified the API returns 10 results at a time.

id.description: The id assigned to the term.

label.description: The name of the given taxonomy term.

type.description: The high level taxonomy type under which the given term belongs.

sub_class_of.description: An array containing hashes with the id and label of each parent term.

datatype_properties.description: A hash containing key/array pairs of datatype properties. Each array contains id/label hashes.

annotations.description: A hash containing key/array pairs of object properties. Each array contains id/label hashes.
